pages.text: Right-click a compatible block (like a container) to place a node on it.$(br)Only one node can be attached to a block at a time.$(br2)If the block is blacklisted, or already has a node, placement fails.

pages.title: Place With Pasted Config
pages.text: You can paste while placing new nodes.$(br)$(li)Keep your copied clipboard on a wrench in your offhand.$(li)Hold the Logistics Node item in main hand.$(li)Place the node as normal.$(br2)The game will auto-apply the offhand clipboard to that new node.

pages.title: Auto-Paste Notes
pages.text: Auto-paste uses the same checks as normal paste.$(br)You still need required filters/upgrades in your inventory.$(br2)If auto-paste fails (invalid clipboard, missing items, or incompatible data), the node is still placed, but without the copied setup.
